entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@replouiegohmert You are the worst of the worst. 
Calling it the “Wuhan virus, getting medical advice from the equally irresponsible @RandPaul , and blaming the mask!
You should try some individual responsibility and try scientific fact instead of political tropes.
#coronavirus #RepublicansVirus
